name: A House of Many Doors Pre-Alpha Demo
name_original: A House of Many Doors Pre-Alpha Demo
description:
Please consider backing me on Kickstarter.

This is a very early alpha. There will be bugs, there will be bad placeholder art, and there won't be much to do. The game is less than halfway through development.

This alpha is just intended to demonstrate to you that the majority of the code is in place and working, and that what the game is most in need of is further writing, art and music.

If you like the look of the game and think it has potential, why not back the game on Kickstarter and upvote me on Greenlight?
